name: .TBP File Extension
summary: Learn about .TBP files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: CAD project file created by Tekla BIMsight, a construction project management application; saves imported CAD files (e.g., .DWG files), annotations, and viewing angles; used for saving building project models in collaborative work environments.

content: TBP files are saved in the .ZIP format and can be opened manually with any Zip decompression tool.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
